title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message:
I have a A2289 from a customer. Not much history on it. It keeps restarting every minute or so. Even when trying to install a new OS. The fan spins on high for a second and it restarts. Not able to do anything. 

 I got a few Panic Medic boot alerts before I was able to erase the device.

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message:
Did you try safe mode?
It restarts even if you let it on Internet recovery, before choosing network?

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 103720, member: 682"]
Did you try safe mode?
It restarts even if you let it on Internet recovery, before choosing network?
[/QUOTE]
Yeah it restarts during everything. Ive just unplugged the touch bar it hasnt restart as yet. Is that a common problem with a touch bar causing bootloop ?

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message: Help! Am I able to leave any of these unplugged ? It works without those. But can I close the device up or should I not give back to the customer until I replace

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message:
You need to disconnect the 3 connectors at same time?

Touchbar needs to be replaced...

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message: yes im asking if i can close the device up with those disconnected for the customer to use her device while i order the part for replacement. Is that possible? can i leave them disconnected

title: A2289 Keeps Restarting
message: It should work; losing function control keys...
